entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Escoumins
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of drizzle near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9.
